oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1947-08-09 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of an aired performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on August 9, 1947 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Riley Shepard (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ann Bond; Lem Hawkins; Thomas Family Trio; Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Blank] / (0:33) Riley Shepard and Ann Bond tell a joke / (1:00) Ann Bond performs "Good Old Fashioned Hoedown" / (3:10) Riley Shepard and Lem Hawkins tell a joke / (5:14) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" / (6:30) Riley Shepard introduces the next song / (6:46) [Unidentified] performs "Feuding and Fighting" / (10:20) Riley Shepard announces a new Oklahoma Roundup time / (10:45) The Thomas Family Trio performs "I Dreamed I Searched Heaven For You" / (12:55) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform the closing theme / (13:39) Closing statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; CBS Inc.; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); Bond, Ann; Davis, Chuck; Shepard, Riley
